name: Tic Tac Toe With AI
description:
A game in which two players seek in alternate turns to complete a row, a column, or a diagonal with either three O's or three X's drawn in the spaces of a grid of nine squares; noughts and crosses. But here you are playing with the computer, so it's a single player game.

I am a 12 years old grade 8 student. This is my first project/game in python (based on my couple of months of self learning in Python, hence a very basic game. Seeking your support and encouragement)
